content.question: Which of the following methods would most likely reduce the effect of hurricanes in urban areas?

choices.label: Installing permeable pavement and increasing green space to increase water infiltration
Using irrigation systems to distribute water to agricultural areas
Combining storm drains with sewer systems to store rainwater at local wastewater treatment facilities
Moving buildings closer to the local river to increase the rate of water drainage after a storm

content.answer: Installing permeable pavement and increasing green space to increase water infiltration
